name: bnomei/kirby3-feed
description: Generate a RSS/JSON-Feed from a Pages-Collection

scripts.zip: rm kirby3-feed.zip; composer update --ignore-platform-reqs; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; zip -r kirby3-feed.zip . -x *.git*; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0' --ignore-platform-reqs; composer dumpautoload -o;
